data.text: @CBCNB I'll burn every single last one of them never putting that dirty bacteria infested thing again on my face ever!
@CBCNB Um I wonâ€™t be wearing mine anymore once March 14th comes. Everyone else can live in fear.
@Jean18538839 @CBCNB It's idiotic to compare these 2 things.

@CBCNB CBC you're loosing readers and watchers by the day. Just to help you out a little... It's because of articles like this one.
#DefundTheCBC
@CBCNB Many people in Toronto wear masks outdoors, even where public health rules don't require them. I have a feeling masks will continue indefinitely.
@CBCNB BS.  Sell biased gov supported nonsense somewhere else CBC.,
@CBCNB i'll be wearing mine and i'll be expecting others to respect my personal space and not breath down my neck!

@CBCNB I'm looking forward to being able to go shopping with my husband for the first time in a long time.  I can't wear a mask ans to avoid confrontation I haven't gone anywhere.  My husband is hard of hearing and has really struggled to have a basic conversation with masks on

@CBCNB The pandemic made me realise how disgusting people really are🤢🤢🤢

At the gym, the heavy breathing, the coughing without covering the mouth, most use the equipment and leave their sweat of the machines!🤢🤢🤢
